wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Gilbert Bull MRCS LRCP (1890–15 March 1963), also known as A.G. Bull, was an England rugby international and Captain of Northampton Saints in 1924.

response: * England rugby caps: Horace Finlinson, WB Thomson, Edgar Mobbs (captain), Arthur Gilbert Bull, Dick Stafford, Harold Day, Dickie Jeeps (captain) and Lionel Edward Weston
*Arthur Gilbert Bull (1890–1963), England rugby international player
